reviews.review_msg: Take the man's courses! It took me 3-4 weeks before I got used to Niall. He has his unique sense of humour that comes from all over the place. The course is demanding in terms of readings, he gives weekly quizzes just to make sure you are up to task. The grading of papers are also a bit harsh, so talk to him during office hours to get informed.

Niall is a rather fantastic professor - amazing sense of humour and an ability to siphon knowledge into your cranium while all you are aware of is that you are having an awesome time. And yes, this man wears Great Socks.
